subject: Weight Lifting
Testosterone
Hormones
Steroids
Tests and Testing
lead_paragraph: Nine Iranian weightlifters tested positive for doping, forcing the national team to withdraw from the coming world championships. The World Anti-Doping Agency tested all 11 Iranian weightlifters Sept. 10, and nine failed, the Iranian weightlifting federation said. Iranian officials blamed the team’s Bulgarian coach, Yourdon Georgy Ivanof, saying he gave the lifters food supplements containing testosterone. Those who failed were not named, but the statement said Hossein Rezazadeh and Asghar Ebrahimi did not test positive.
